title: Gruesome Video of ‘TMC Goons Attacking BJP Man’ is From Bihar
subtitle: Viral Fact-Check Video: A video of a man getting hacked went viral with the claim Trinamool goons hack BJP worker in Bengal village
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of a man getting hacked went viral with the claim “‘Trinamool goons hack BJP worker in Bengal village’

Alleged Trinamool goons attack Sagar Roy, a BJP worker from Kaligram, Chanchal, Malda North, after polling. Roy had reportedly resisted Trinamool's attempt at booth capturing.”

The video was tweeted by ‘Sirf News’ and also went viral on Facebook and Twitter.
